detail_desc: Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Trousers in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and smocked hems.
Trousers in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and smocked hems.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Short, fitted jersey dress with long sleeves and a visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Short, fitted jersey dress with long sleeves and a visible zip at the back. Unlined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Lined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Lined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Lined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Metal watch with a narrow adjustable strap with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch approx. 2.7 cm.
Metal watch with a narrow adjustable strap with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch approx. 2.7 cm.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides. Slim Fit – a fit that is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knee down to create a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Bootees in soft, fine-knit cotton with foldover ribbing at the top and jersey linings. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Bikini top with lined cups, removable inserts and narrow shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Bikini top with lined cups, removable inserts and narrow shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Bikini top with lined cups, removable inserts and narrow shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, straps at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, straps at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Jumper in a fine knit with decorative beading and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in stretch denim with a collar, zip down the front and long sleeves. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in stretch denim with a collar, zip down the front and long sleeves. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in patterned jersey containing glittery threads with a deep V-neck and long sleeves.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar with a button at the back of the neck and an opening front and back. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Smartphone case in transparent plastic with metallic-coloured trims and a smartphone ring with a disc that can be rotated by 360°. Fits iPhones 6-8.
Oversized dress in a crêpe weave with decorative plastic beads around the neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and wide, half-length sleeves. Unlined.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, jetted front pockets and no buttons. Lined.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, jetted front pockets and no buttons. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in soft organic cotton. Bodysuit in patterned jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front, an elasticated waist, a kangaroo pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Thin metal chain necklaces with round, coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length, approx. 43-50 cm and 50-58 cm.
Thin metal chain necklaces with round, coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length, approx. 43-50 cm and 50-58 cm.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves. Zip down the front that continues down one leg and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves. Zip down the front that continues down one leg and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves. Zip down the front that continues down one leg and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves. Zip down the front that continues down one leg and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with a sailor collar, decorative bow at the front and concealed press-stud at the neckline. Gathered seam at the top and a sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.

Imitation suede sandals with narrow ankle straps with lacing at the front and covered heels. Imitation leather linings, imitation suede insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 10 cm.
Sun hat in dobby-weave organic cotton with broderie anglaise and ties under the chin. Width of brim 5 cm. Lined.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Striped bow tie in satin with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.
Watch in metal with sparkly stones around the face, and a narrow, adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.2 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.8 cm.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Short-sleeved dress with a sewn-in bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey and a tulle skirt. Bodysuit with a scalloped neckline, short sleeves and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Skirt with shimmering spots and a sewn-on bow.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas in a patterned viscose weave. Top with a gentle V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and a small frill trim at the waist.

Windbreaker in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, a mesh-lined drawstring hood, a zip down the front and welt side pockets. Elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with long sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fitted running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, a small zipped pocket at the back, reflective details and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Bustier in an airy, patterned cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck with a tie detail at the front and wide smocking at the back.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in airy, striped, crinkled viscose with narrow elastication, a flounce and an opening with ties at the top. Short sleeves with flounced trims.
Sleeveless blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, wide flounce at the front that continues over the shoulders, and an elasticated hem.
Short V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with buttons down the front, short sleeves and a tie at the hem.
Tube top in a patterned viscose weave with elastication and a small frill at the top and a small opening with ties at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and flared hem.
Long, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a fastening with one button at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Long, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a fastening with one button at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, an open back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short dungaree dress in imitation leather with adjustable straps that fasten with press-studs and a visible zip down the front. Lined at the top.
Short dungaree dress in imitation leather with adjustable straps that fasten with press-studs and a visible zip down the front. Lined at the top.
Short dungaree dress in imitation leather with adjustable straps that fasten with press-studs and a visible zip down the front. Lined at the top.
Sandals with open heels and toes, lacing and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
